name: HellroN
description:
HellroN is a first-person shooter (FPS) game.
Made Solo in 7 days for the BRSD 10 (Game Jam).
It was developed using the Godot Engine.

Controls:
[W] [A] [S] [D] = Movement
[Left Mouse button] = Fire Weapon
[Spacebar] = Jump

CC0 asset credits and links:
Enemy and Object Sprites : Paul Zarczynski
